Your AI Assistant,
Actually Working

OpenClaw is the self-hosted gateway that connects AI agents to Telegram, WhatsApp, Discord, and more. Message your AI from any device. No cloud required. Your data, your rules.

Core Features

Everything You Need, Nothing You Don't

Three steps to a fully working personal AI assistant

Install in 5 Minutes

One npm command installs OpenClaw globally. The onboarding wizard walks you through API key setup, daemon installation, and first run. No Docker, no config files to manually edit.

See install guide â†’
Most Popular
ðŸ’¬

Connect to Telegram

Create a Telegram bot in 60 seconds via BotFather, paste the token into OpenClaw, and your AI is live. Send messages from your phone, get intelligent responses back instantly.

Connect Telegram â†’
ðŸŽ­

Create Your AI Persona

Define exactly who your AI is with a SOUL.md file. Give it a name, personality, skills, and memory. Your AI becomes a unique entity that understands your context and preferences.

Build your persona â†’
Real-World Case Study

See It In Action: The BlackPink Trading Team

Four team members, four specialized AI personas, one shared OpenClaw gateway. Together they run a Hydra trading bot, real-time market analysis, news aggregation, and risk management â€” all from their phones via Telegram.

RosÃ© manages the Hydra quant bot. Lisa handles technical analysis. Jisoo monitors global news feeds. Jennie does portfolio risk assessment. Each persona is fine-tuned for its role.

Quick Start

Up and Running in 3 Commands

1. Install
npm install -g openclaw@latest
2. Onboard
openclaw onboard --install-daemon
3. Start
openclaw gateway --port 18789
